title: Vehicle Hacking Shifts From Theory to Scary
text: BING NEWS: Hacking of Connected Vehicles Shifts From Theory to Very Scary Sometime over the next few weeks, California battery carmaker Tesla Motors plans to ask a select group of owners to begin testing its latest vehicle-operating software.
